scripts.build: npm run clean && tsc --project tsconfig.json && npm run bundle:esm && npm run bundle:esm:min && npm run bundle:umd && npm run bundle:umd:min && npm run build:stats
scripts.build:stats: (echo '\033[35;3m' ; cd out && ls -lh index*js index*gz | tail -n +2 | awk '{print $5,$9}')
scripts.bundle:esm:min: terser --ecma 6 --compress --mangle --module -o out/index.min.mjs -- out/index.mjs && gzip -9 -c out/index.min.mjs > out/index.min.mjs.gz
scripts.bundle:umd:min: terser --ecma 6 --compress --mangle -o out/index.umd.min.js -- out/index.umd.js && gzip -9 -c out/index.umd.min.js > out/index.umd.min.js.gz
